Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"The office staff are great with communication and service scheduling requests." "As a company they’re responsive and prices are reasonable." "I'm very pleased with the professionalism and quality of their work."

We hired Borden to install a spa heater and update our control panel. They were easy to communicate with, had competitive pricing and were excellent at all points of contact. They will be our go to pool service company from here on out. Britton was our installation guy and he was fantastic. Thanks guys!

Frankie Carson has been servicing our pool for over 5 years. When he left in April to join Borden Pools, we tried staying with the previous pool company. Within a month, we started noticing the pool was getting cloudy and getting green with … More

Borden Pools have taken great care of my pool for 5 years. They are hear weekly for cleaning and chemicals. If there is a problem, they are quick to respond. Frankie has been especially helpful. He takes great care of the pool and gives great advice and explanations.
